comment.author: 82454049@N08
comment._content:
Andrew Pleym may have been a  brother of one of my ancestors, but we know very little about him, from the time he emigrated from the kingdom of Denmark-Norway (his family lived in the small town of Fredrikshald, now Halden), and immigrated to Norway from Denmark in the 1680's. Its believed that the family's origin was in Holland. 

Any information about Andrew Pleym? Write to me at pleym at hotmail.com
